component.name: SectionIntro
component.title: A new world is born
component.text: Your journey in the metaverse begins now

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Open your eyes
component.text:
Explore an extraordinary and vast universe, home to a wonderful Open World filled with vibrant cities. Discover neo-futuristic architectural wonders, from impressive buildings to sacred monuments.
Take your chances in the dangerous but stunning wild regions, home to a mysterious wildlife. Lose yourself to extraordinary sceneries and explore new limits in a world your wildest imagination could not picture.

Where will you begin your journey?

slides.title: Astralis
slides.text: Magically suspended in the sky, Astralis is the capital city of the noble Celestials, the most prestigious race in Meta Life. Home to clear lakes, hyper-modern buildings and neo-futuristic architectural spaces, Astralis never ceases to charm both visitors and locals.

slides.title: Neopolis
slides.text: Home of the Matrix Angels, Neopolis is a wonderful city of modernity and breathtaking architecture. Filled with new technologies and immense knowledge in computer engineering, The City of Hackers - as some may call it - prevails in hosting hi-tech cybernetics and industrial sciences progress.

slides.title: The Wildlings
slides.text: An unspoiled land of jungle, lakes, rivers, waterfalls and magical creatures near Astralis. An extraordinary adventure for those brave enough to explore, in search of exceptional resources. Incredibles sceneries and a vibrant wildlife await you.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: Home of the Cybers, a race of brilliant beings who found success and safety in the metaverse after the end of the world we know. Its marvelous structure allows for rivers and seas to connect through a magnificent and modern coastline of modern tech-filled skyscrapers.

slides.title: The Swamps
slides.text: A dangerous area filled with exotic wildlife. Once a place of worship for ancient divinities, but nature has reclaimed its territory and made it hard to navigate for the people of Meta Life. Swamps, creatures, magical plants, wild vegetation and ancient monuments prevail. But a place of many resources and treasure for whom will dare to explore.

slides.title: Tahana, City of Light
slides.text: Tahana belongs to the Celestials, and was built after their will for expansion outside of Astralis. Filled with bazzling godly monuments, it owes its name to the divinities that have made it possible to erect a magical city among the clouds.

slides.title: C-111, Roboters Garage
slides.text: Within Capital-111, a neo-dystopian representation of the Roboters’ perceived reality, can be found numerous high-end technology workshops with baffling wonders of Roboters engineering. Powered with cutting-edge AI, robotic creatures are then used for defending the city.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: A sky-view of the city of Cybers. Its futuristic buildings and glass windowed buildings make up for its reputation: a place of light and rebirth. New Heaven was named after its purpose to provide a new place for Cybers to thrive and escape from the world into the metaverse. Paradise found.

slides.title: Kharan
slides.text: Flying dragon Celestial creature, Kharan is one of the few flying creatures in Meta Life. It features a natural celestial shield of protection, and is capable of casting heavy magical spells to annihilate enemies.

slides.title: Domenox
slides.text: A high speed Matrix Angel creature, AI-programed to being capable of jumping to high distances and surprise enemies. Domenox also is quite a resistant creature but its sensitive areas are at mercy.

slides.title: Ariox
slides.text: Ariox is an Insectoid Matrix Angel creature capable of moving at high-speed in multiple directions. It has the ability to track, sense and capture enemies thanks to its internal AI hunting system programmed to deploying a net of projectiles, trapping its target. Despite its resistant shell, Ariox still remains an easy target.

slides.title: Pronghar
slides.text: Pronghar is a high-velocity Roboter creature, often referred to as “The Proud One”. It has the stance of a royal creature, descended from divinities, and sights of a predator. It is highly agile, fast and wares off its adversaries at great speed.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Your new life
component.text:
Own pieces of land to use their ressources. Build your new home in the metaverse to settle in Meta Life.

Meet new friends, attend events, host parties. Have fun in Meta life’s rich social life.

slides.title: Map of Meta Life
slides.text: Twenty-one cities compose the world of Meta Life, itself divided into purchasable plots of land on which to build, craft, find resources and monetize. Lands are partly owned by the community and allow for high personal customization enabling private residency and/or lucrative enterprises (events, games, exhibitions etc.).

slides.title: Land concept
slides.text: Stunning pieces of land on which to create your own perception of Meta Life and share it with your friends, in the metaverse. Rent, lend, buy, sell, host events etc., possibilities are endless. Your home, your property, your decisions.

slides.title: Matrix Angel Penthouse
slides.text: A large property made of sizable floors and an integrated futuristic playground at purchase.

slides.title: Matrix Angel Villa
slides.text: A comfortable home, with built-in new technologies allowing for optimal automation of the house, and its own integrated AI assistant: Meyna.

slides.title: Matrix Angel Pyra
slides.text: An architectural wonder, pure product of Matrix Angel engineering. Directly inspired from ancient divinities, the Pyra’s design offers futuristic elements of comfort.

slides.title: Goldboi Palace
slides.text: Goldboi homes have the most luxuriant pieces of furniture and decorations, with vibrant crystals, shiny materials and omnipresent gildings.

slides.title: Goldboi Sphera
slides.text: The Sphera is a specific home of the Goldboi region, meant to capture natural light and highlight its great interior. The tainted glass windows, doors and walls make it a unique house to live in.

slides.title: Goldboi Rubyn
slides.text: The Rubyn employs shapes similar to cathedrals, with very rectangular angles and a center made of precious stones. Its name comes from the color of its core piece: the Ruby.

slides.title: Burner Temple
slides.text: Named after its shape, the Burner Temple residence features brilliant architectural shapes and designs. A medium-sized home with lots of style.

slides.title: Burner Pool Mansion
slides.text: Burner Mansions, and especially those with swimming pools, are extraordinary homes, typical of the elites of Barad-Mörr. Their edgy curves, series of floors and amazing views allow for great overall comfort.

slides.title: Burner SkyHome
slides.text: The SkyHomes are known for their futuristic platforms, allowing for flying vehicles to land seamlessly. Their shape is rather vertical and their size varies depending on the neighborhood they were implemented in.

slides.title: Roboter Pool Villa
slides.text: Roboters have a unique conceptual way of designing their homes, and the Pool Villa stands as one of the most luxuriant homes of the Meta Life world. With high ceilings and incredible glass openings, owners of this property can enjoy natural light at its best.

slides.title: Roboter TriHouse
slides.text: The TriHouse has a unique, yet quite familiar, silhouette with triangle shapes and futuristic overall design. Its surrounding swimming pool makes it an exquisite place of residence.

slides.title: Roboter N-13
slides.text: The N-13 is a typical Roboters residence, with glass-built openings and great volumes of space. Despite its smaller swimming pool, it still offers amazing overall comfort.

slides.title: Rough Metallion
slides.text: The Metallion is common-sighted in and around Rust, the capital of Roughs. Despite its rusty and rustic looks, it remains quite comfortable.

slides.title: Rough Favela House
slides.text: Built solely from retrieved objects, pieces of furniture and materials, the Favela Houses are the most affordable houses in Meta Life. Their location on the outskirts of Rust, also make them less attractive to the general market.

slides.title: Rough Verti
slides.text: The Verti was named after its vertical shape and design. Often called ‘Wobblies’, these residences have lasted through time and are affordable pieces of housing.

slides.title: Celestial SkyMansion
slides.text: The Celestial SkyMansion is a common house in Astralis and Tahana, cities of Celestials. Its high-end designs and looks, as well as its overall luxuriant comfort make up for its hefty price.

slides.title: Celestial Yachtia
slides.text: The Yachtias are among the most expensive, luxurious and high-end houses in Meta Life. Providing their owners with incredibly unique architecture, bazzling swimming pools and immense parking spaces.

slides.title: Celestial Future Penthouse
slides.text: The Future Penthouse, as its name indicates, is built vertically and features futuristic lines and edges, allowing for a premium stay or residency. An ideal purchase for those who can afford it.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Experience the metaverse
component.text:
Gear up with weapons, travel the marvelous map of Meta Life on a motorbike or purchase a shiny new armor set.
Buy, sell, stake or lend your assets to other players. The possibilities are endless.

slides.title: LS-12
slides.text: The LS-12 - short for Light Sniper of 12th Generation - is a Burner-crafted heavy rifle loaded with Fire Ammunition. Despite its looks, this brilliant product of Burner engineering is quite light but its reach is not optimal. An ideal pick for heavy damage, at close and medium distances.

slides.title: Winger Heavy Rifle
slides.text: Often referred to as WHR or simply Winger, and named after its Celestial roots, the Winger is a very heavy sniper rifle with long-distance accuracy and excellent stability, at the expense of agility and speed. It is a rare piece, owned by very few and used by even less.

slides.title: SCAB-C
slides.text: The Scab-C SMG is a great choice for medium to long-distance auto shooting. It is precise, light and exquisitely beautiful. A pure product of Celestial engineering, the SCAB-C is a prestigious weapon often given as reward to the bravest.

slides.title: M1015
slides.text: The M1015 was created by Cybers looking for a close-range combat weapon capable of being as light as powerful at short distances. Its heavy ammo and slick design make it an ideal companion for pure enemy annihilation.

slides.title: Xondor ZERO-11
slides.text: The Xondor ZERO-11 is a Cyber electric motorcycle. Known for its ‘fastest terrain vehicle in Meta Life’ reputation, it includes a speeder boost with nitro and 21-inch wheels made for velocity. A brilliant piece of technology.

slides.title: Buggy Jumper
slides.text: The four-wheel ‘Fast Escape’ Rough vehicle is the lightest of all four-wheel vehicles. Its strong engine makes accelerating an easy task, and its impressive tires allow make deserts and rocky environments look easy to cruise.

slides.title: Alerion
slides.text: The Alerion armor set brings a versatile, balanced and devastatingly efficient upgrade to the Cyber base kit. Equipped, this tactical masterpiece lets you own the battlefield.

slides.title: Eludhel
slides.text: Evasive medium-weight Matrix Angel armor set used to diverge direct attacks, move lightly and take opponents by surprise. Stealth and durability, combined.

slides.title: Hermes’ Wrath
slides.text: This Roboter-crafted armour set is tailored to suit ruthless, deadly fights. It is durable and meant for an agile type of experience.

slides.title: SkySuit
slides.text: The Cyber SkySuit is a brilliant piece of aggregated new technologies with intelligent back and front armored protections reacting to strong impacts. Usually used to deal with high levels of atmospheric pressure.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Your new economy
component.text:
Meta Life is powered by $METAL, its dual economy token.

Earn xMETAL by staking assets, selling on the marketplace and lending to other players. Swap it for ETH anytime.

Swap xMETAL for METAL - our governance token - to participe in the Meta Life DAO and help shape the future of your metaverse.

component.name: SectionHeading
component.title: Join us now
component.text: Meta Life will be available soon. Discover the latest news on our social accounts.
